domain.name: Political Body
domain.description: A section of a government, like The Supreme Court

entity.name: The White House
entity.description: Conversation from and about the White House, both as a destination and as political voice

text: @ChrisCuomo Ass - anyone looking to get rich quick off a health crisis like this pandemic deserves to have their accounts frozen. Lesson: You don't fleece your fellow human when they are afraid for their health or lives. It's bad enough the public has to teach the WH the same thing.
